name: Flying Safari Senegal
about: Flying Safari Senegal is a premier aviation training and safari experience provider based in Dakar, Senegal. We offer specialized training programs in partnership with Airways Aviation, ensuring students receive top-notch education in aviation. Our flying safaris utilize state-of-the-art aircraft, such as the Pilatus PC12, to transport clients to Africa's most breathtaking wildlife destinations. With experienced private guides and meticulous itinerary planning, we ensure a seamless and luxurious travel experience. Our services include fly-in safaris, scenic flights, and wildlife spotting adventures via helicopters and hot-air balloons. We are committed to providing exceptional aviation training and unforgettable safari experiences, making every journey a memorable one.
